headline: 2 Popes Take Differing Views on Priestly Celibacy
abstract: In a new book, the former pope makes a firm defense of celibacy for priests as Pope Francis is expected to decide whether to allow married priests in remote regions. Let the intrigue begin.
lead_paragraph: ROME — The theologically fraught relationship between two living popes — fictionalized in a current movie — is beginning to have very real consequences for the obligation of celibacy for priests in the Roman Catholic Church.
keywords: From the Depths of Our Hearts: Priesthood, Celibacy and the Crisis of the Catholic Church (Book)
